· Generating the reports for monitoring and support using DW.
· Developed several customised functions and triggers to handle multiple scenarios within the system, as per the requirement.

· Solely handled the Time management module for the application.
· Build procedures and function to accomplish the task, also handling the various scenarios for the system.
· Bug fixing and providing production support for the implemented application.
·
